word_mean: 尼古丁，烟碱：分子式为C10H14N2，毒性极大的无可溶性生物碱，有吡啶的气味和辣的味道，由烟草中或经合成取得。用作农业杀虫药，在兽医中作为外杀寄生虫药，在药理与生理学研究中，用其对神经的作用(见nicotiinic))

sentence.Network_en: After about three months, I was no longer addicted to nicotine.
sentence.Network_cn: 大约3个月后，我就不再对尼古丁上瘾了。

sentence.Network_en: It allows nicotine to diffuse slowly and steadily into the bloodstream.
sentence.Network_cn: 它能使尼古丁平稳缓慢地渗透到血液里。

sentence.Network_en: Nicotine marks stained his chin and fingers.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼古丁渍染黄了他的下巴和手指。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French, from nicotiana + -ine

entry.def: Nicotine is the substance in tobacco that people can become addicted to.

example.ex: Nicotine produces a feeling of well-being in the smoker...
example.tran: 尼古丁给吸烟者带来一种愉悦的感觉。

example.ex: Nicotine marks stained his chin and fingers.
example.tran: 尼古丁渍染黄了他的下巴和手指。

means.word_mean: 1. an alkaloid poison that occurs in tobacco; used in medicine and as an insecticide

sentences.en: Many smokers who are chemically addicted to nicotine cannot cut down easily.
